person.persName: Samuel G. Watson (Taylor County, Kentucky, resident and soldier (13th KY Inf))

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Adair County, Kentucky, native. Son of Archer Watson and Eliza Watson. Married to Nancy Howard Watson in Taylor County, Kentucky, in December 1865. Resident of Adair County in 1850. Resident of Taylor County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private and corporal from December 31, 1861 to January 12, 1865. Wounded in battle in Tennessee in November 1863.
